title: Sid.Meier's.Civilization.Beyond.Earth.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Sid.Meier's.Civilization.Beyond.Earth.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  

Release year : 2014
Genre : Strategy (Turn-based / Grand Strategy) / 3D
Developer : Firaxis Games
Publisher : 2K
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Rus | Eng
Crack: 3DM




System requirements:  

Operating system : Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7 or Windows 8
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 64 2.0 GHz
RAM : 2 GB
Video card : 256 MB
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0c
Free space on hard disk : 5.8 GB


Game information:  

Sid Meier's Civilization: Beyond Earth - a new part of the famous series,
made in the category of science fiction. The game takes place in a future
where global events led to the collapse of modern society and the emergence
of a new world order, and left the fate of humanity in question. People are
struggling to survive, and the newly formed nation focus on space missions
to find a place where you can start all over again.

You are part of the expedition sent by the construction of the alien houses,
and write the next chapter in the development of mankind, leading his people
to the new frontier in space and creating a new civilization. Explore and
populate another planet, developing new technologies, collect powerful armies,
build wonders of the alien world, determine the shape of the new world. Going
on a trip, you need to take very important decisions. Each of your choice from
the sponsor of the expedition to the composition of the colony, opens limitless
opportunities.


Game Features:  

Manage adventures. Create a new nation, define its cultural identity, choosing
one of the eight missions, each with its own leader and its own unique features.
Organizes expeditions, collecting spacecraft, cargo, and the colonists by the
various decisions that depend on the initial conditions of a new planet.
Colonize another planet. Find out what is dangerous and what is profitable new
planet with its dangerous terrain, extraordinary resources and hostile life forms.
Build outposts find relics of alien races, strange beasts tamed, create trade routes
and develop great city to ensure the prosperity of his people.
Web of technology. To submit a progress leading to the indefinite future, the
development of technologies implemented in the form of non-linear variants that
influence the development of mankind. Web of technology, there are three areas,
each of which correspond to their victory conditions.
Actions in orbit. Cook and commissioning of advanced military, economic and scientific
satellites, which will provide you defense, attack and support from orbit.
Setting gaming units. open various improvements in the web technologies and adjust
their units according to the style of play.


RePack Features:  

Sid Meier's Civilization: Beyond Earth
Game Version - v1.0.0.574
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice (via the launcher)


Additions :  

Exoplanets Map Pack
